Text: I don't understand why they make lower budget games, like these, in XGD3! Not many people are going to play this game anyway.

You need to use IHAS drive to burn it other wise the game screws up after the first misson and gets a read error.

Don't bother though cause its a crap game, the reviews, although not great, were lenient. If you have ever played a current gen shooter you can not play this, it is terrible. And it is too different from the original for any nostalgia. The multiplayer split screen has all new (crap) maps.
